title: Identical nodes in connections tree
author: Googleboom
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I have several servers that are shared between tree branches (projects). Nodes have the same server name/IP and same user name+domain. 
When I have a RDP connection already opened in one branch and click on the identical node in another branch, I am asked to enter credentials and the connection is re-opened.
